description: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
info: For strength heroes, it grants 60 health, 0.3 health regen, 0.24% magic resistance and 3 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 60 health, 0.3 health regen and 0.24% magic resistance.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 60 health, 0.3 health regen and 0.24% magic resistance.
